Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a grey-red pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the interior is covered with a grey-black deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of at least five lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393955) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393955)
